title: Noatak National Preserve: Education
body: Remote Wilderness  Though Noatak is difficult to visit, you can use our teacher resources to bring this special wilderness to you! As a wilderness full of wild animals, Noatak is a perfect place to learn about biology and how scientists study wildlife. Dive into our lesson plans to get started.                 Hoofin' It! Lesson 1 The lesson plans in our 'Hoofin' It!' unit help students learn the basics of animal classification and what characteristics are common to mammals. Read More        Western Arctic Parklands Junior Ranger Students can complete the activities in the Western Arctic Parklands Junior Ranger book and mail the book to the park to receive a junior ranger badge Read More        Biosphere Reserve The Noatak basin is designated as a UNESCO biosphere reserve.
